author: donaldp
msg: Update to us JavaBeanMBean instead of DynamicMBeanFactory to create bean.

author: donaldp
msg: Null out hook in forced shutdown or else runtime will try to remove hook from runtime and this will cause an exception (because runtime is in shutdown mode).

author: colus
msg: Updated excalibur, scratchpad and logkit for eliminate small bugs.

author: donaldp
msg: Guard agains removing a null shutdown hook. This makes it possible to use --disable-hook option again.

author: donaldp
msg: Register all kernel components with JMX.
Use HtmlAdaptor for the time being as a development aid.
